properties.areaDesc: Delaware; Eastern Chester; Western Montgomery; Eastern Montgomery; Philadelphia
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 8 at 2:33PM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
At 233 PM EST, a snow squall was located over King Of Prussia, or 13
miles northeast of West Chester, moving southeast at 50 mph. A brief
period of moderate to heavy snow and visibilities of near to below
one mile are possible as this squall passes.

Locations impacted include...
Philadelphia, Camden, Norristown, West Norriton, East Norriton,
Yeadon, Conshohocken, Jenkintown, Narberth, East Lansdowne,
Rockledge, Wissinoming, Morris Park, Bryn Mawr, Trout Lake, Tacony,
Radnor Township, Broomall, Kensington and Newtown Square.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 15 and 32.
Interstate 476 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 7 and 19.
Pennsylvania Turnpike between exits 326 and 333.
Northeast Extension near exit A20.
Interstate 676 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 1.
Interstate 76 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 327 and 351.

Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this snow
squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may
lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the squall passes
your location.

NWSheadline: A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY...NORTHEASTERN CHESTER...PHILADELPHIA AND NORTHEASTERN DELAWARE COUNTIES
